title: Passwords ? Extinction Event Looming?
description: Passwords are the bane of users and security teams? lives. Despite years of security teams educating users about not using 123456 as a password, not recycling passwords across multiple personal and professional accounts, and implementing even more rigorous password rules and investments in password manager tools, these combinations of letters, numbers, and special characters remain a rich target for attackers.
author: Richard Meeus
